name: Rescue Rocket (diegonher)
description:
Navigate through deep space, avoid crashing and rescue all stranded astronauts in this 2D puzzle game based on gravity forces.

The challenge is that you can only control the rocket acceleration. You will carefully  have to learn how to take advantage of the gravity forces from planets and other objects to guide your rocket. Rescue all stranded astronauts to complete each level. 

Use Up and Down arrow keys to control the rocket. You can zoom out with the space bar and use R to reset the level.

The game is fully functional, but it only has a few level as a proof of concept. I might expand it in the future, adding more levels and more gameplay features.
